contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German location |Art = Stadt |image_photo = Lebach.jpg |image_caption = Lebach in 2007 |Wappen = Wappen Lebach.svg |lat_deg = 49 |lat_min = 24 |lat_sec = 36 |lon_deg = 6 |lon_min = 54 |lon_sec = 36 |Lageplan = Lebach in SLS.svg |Bundesland = Saarland |Landkreis = Saarlouis |Höhe = 200-450 |Fläche = 64.15 |Einwohner = 20388 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 66811–66822 |Vorwahl = 06881 |Kfz = SLS |Gemeindeschlüssel = 10 0 44 112 |Website = [http://www.lebach.de/ www.lebach.de] |Bürgermeister = Arno Schmidt |Partei = CDU |}} '''Lebach''' is a town in the [[Saarlouis (district)|district of Saarlouis]], in [[Saarland]], [[Germany]]. It is situated approximately 15 km northeast of [[Saarlouis]], and 20 km north of [[Saarbrücken]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.lebach.de/ Official homepage] {{commonscat|Lebach}} {{Cities and towns in Saarlouis (district)}} {{Saarland-geo-stub}}
